column4: I just locked up my computer (printscreen key was jammed) and now I can load up my login...its stuck at the world icon in kde, anyone help ?
does anyone how I can force a disk scan ? instead of waiting the allocated boot-times ?
fdisk in terminal will give you options
I just zapped my system, and now it won't boot...do you think this might fix it ?
by boot into system what do you mean can you get a terminl
yes
using the terminal now, tty1
but thats it, kde never finishes the loading,
I tried the failsafe, but it won't load either
what did you do to "zap it"
alt ctrl backspace
I just got this error, no write access to /home/user/.ICEAuthority
type sudo killall kdm
done.
did you get any output ie no process killed
no output, but I think i had just terminated it moments before
wait,
can I try to just chown user /home/user/.ICEAuthority ?
or will that break something ?
sudo start kdm
still hangs
you still having problem logging into X
